abstract: Panel endorses HPV vaccine for boys, low-income graduates get student loan relief, how Rick Perry's tax plan would affect you and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
snippet: Panel endorses HPV vaccine for boys, low-income graduates get student loan relief, how Rick Perry's tax plan would affect you and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Wednesday Reading: HPV Vaccine Endorsed for Boys
